.. _spkg_sage_numerical_interactive_mip:

sage_numerical_interactive_mip: Interactive mixed integer linear programming solver
===================================================================================

Description
-----------

Interactive mixed integer linear programming solver

Type
----

optional

- :ref:`spkg_sagemath_plot`
